availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John Gibbs (Louisville, Kentucky, printer and river pilot)

body.p: Louisville, Kentucky, printer and river pilot. Pennsylvania native. River pilot in Louisville, Kentucky, in 1860. Printer in Louisville in 1861. Killed by James H. Montgomery in Louisville on January 28, 1862.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Louisville, District 5, p. 210.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll 994040, Jefferson County Deaths.

"Jefferson Circuit Court-Criminal Term," The Louisville Daily Journal, (Louisville, KY), May 8, 1862, p. 3.
